name: Refraction
summary: Refraction is an addicting puzzle game using lasers and prisms. Use mirrors and prisms to split or combine colored lasers, while interacting with various environmental objects. Refraction offers distinct and creative levels, great graphics, a fantastic UI, and multiple solutions to each level for casual and intense players alike. With hours of playtime and various solutions, this game is sure to keep you entertained. Let's hope your logic skills are up to the task!
